item.content:encoded:
Incentivizing Bandit Exploration: Recommendations as Instruments [workshop paper][poster]
Incentives in Machine Learning Workshop at International Conference on Machine Learning (IML@ICML) 2020
Mechanism Design for Social Good Workshop (MD4SG) 2020
Daniel Ngo, Logan Stapleton, Nicole Immorlica, Vasilis Syrgkanis, Zhiwei Steven Wu

Attentional autoencoder for weighted implicit collaborative filtering Proceedings of the 2019 2nd International Conference on Computational Intelligence and Intelligent Systems
Hoang-Vu Dang, Dung Ngo

item.dc:creator: tuandungngo207
item.description: I am a second year PhD student at University of Minnesota, co-advised by Professors Steven Wu and Maria Gini. I studied computer science and math at Dickinson College for my undergrad. I am interested in machine learning and algorithms. My current work focuses on bandit algorithms and differential privacy.
item.content:encoded:
I am a second year PhD student at University of Minnesota, co-advised by Professors Steven Wu and Maria Gini. I studied computer science and math at Dickinson College for my undergrad.

I am interested in machine learning and algorithms. My current work focuses on bandit algorithms and differential privacy.
